title: Maurice Frilot
text: Maurice Frilot (November 29, 1940 – October 30, 2021) was an American <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201964%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1964 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Ernest%20Mabwa">Ernest Mabwa</a> of Uganda by decision in the Round of 32. Frilot died on October 30, 2021, at the age of 80.
